"Wh-what is the matter?" asked both the young and old Rostov. 
Anna Mikhdylovna sighed deeply. 
"D61okhov, Mary Ivdnovna's son," she said in a mysterious whisper, "has compromised her completely, they say. Pierre took him up, in- vited him to his house in Petersburg, and now ... she has come here and that da
